section.title: Install Homebrew
section.screen:
MacBook-Pro:Mac netkiller$ ruby -e "$(curl -fsSL https://raw.github.com/Homebrew/homebrew/go/install)" ==> This script will install: /usr/local/bin/brew /usr/local/Library/... /usr/local/share/man/man1/brew.1
Press RETURN to continue or any other key to abort ==> /usr/bin/sudo /bin/chmod g+rwx /Library/Caches/Homebrew Password: ==> Downloading and installing Homebrew... remote: Counting objects: 181683, done. remote: Compressing objects: 100% (50028/50028), done. remote: Total 181683 (delta 130487), reused 181683 (delta 130487) Receiving objects: 100% (181683/181683), 35.61 MiB | 199.00 KiB/s, done. Resolving deltas: 100% (130487/130487), done. From https://github.com/Homebrew/homebrew * [new branch] master -> origin/master HEAD is now at 157e172 pike: 7.8.866 ==> Installation successful! ==> Next steps Run `brew doctor` before you install anything Run `brew help` to get started MacBook-Pro:Mac netkiller$
